TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlTriggerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlTriggerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlTriggerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于将程序集中的方法定义标记为 SQL Server 中的触发器。

span.span: Used to mark a method definition in an assembly as a trigger in SQL Server.

summary.span: 该特性的属性反映了向 SQL Server 注册该类型时所使用的实体特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical attributes used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 CLR 触发器和示例的详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 2005 联机丛书中的 "CLR 触发器"。See "CLR Triggers" in SQL Server 2005 Books Online for more information on CLR triggers and examples. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 指定触发器的名称、目标表和将激发触发器的事件。The following example shows the specifying the name of the trigger, the target table, and the event that will fire the trigger. 有关完整的触发器示例，请参阅。See for the full trigger example. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 程序集中的方法定义的特性，用于将方法标记为 SQL Server 中的触发器。

span.span: An attribute on a method definition in an assembly, used to mark the method as a trigger in SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例指定通过更新表中) (现有数据来激活触发器 `UPDATE` `authors` 。The following example specifies that the trigger is activated by updating existing data (`UPDATE`) in the table `authors`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Trigger1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Trigger1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Event { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Event : string with get, set

summary.span: 触发器的类型和激活触发器的数据操作语言 (DML) 操作。

span.span: The type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示触发器类型以及激活该触发器的数据操作语言 (DML) 操作。

span.span: A value representing the type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 激活触发器的 DML 操作可能是更新、删除或插入操作。The DML action that activates the trigger could be an UPDATE, a DELETE, or an INSERT action. 触发器的类型可以在之后或而不是。The type of the trigger can be AFTER or INSTEAD OF. 为触发器类型指定为与指定 AFTER 相同。Specifying FOR for the trigger type is the same as specifying AFTER. 属性是必需的。The property is required.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

value.span: 一个表示触发器名称的 值。

span.span: A value representing the name of the trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

span.span: The table to which the trigger applies.

value.span: 一个表示表名的 值。

span.span: A value representing the table name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是必需的。The property is required. 下面的示例指定使用名称引用触发器 `trig_onpubinsert` 。The following example specifies that the trigger is referenced by using the name `trig_onpubinsert`. 通过向表中添加新的数据 (`INSERT`) 来激活触发器 `publishers` 。The trigger is activated by adding new data (`INSERT`) to the table `publishers`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Trigger1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Trigger1.vb#9)]
